name: AnimeBot
0:
”Alexa, ask Anime Bot for a random post”
”Alexa, open Anime Bot”
”Alexa, ask anime Bot for a random post about anime world problems”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime bot
des: The skill returns a random post from one of the the subreddit r/animeworldproblems on Reddit. This skill is as simple as it sounds, request a post from the Anime Bot, and it shall deliver.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
